name: 英語會話（一）
comment: 建議修習輔系第一年時選修
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)、輔系修習◎限大一修習
goals: to elevate students’ confidence and motivation to participate in English conversation
to broaden their knowledge pertaining to English conversation
to enhance their skills in conducting English conversation
syllabus:
**Course Description:**
-----------------------

This course will focus on building English conversational skills and at the same time provide students the opportunities to use the language in discussing many topics in class.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Learning Outcomes**
---------------------

By the end of this course students should know better about how to start a conversation, keep a conversation and end a conversation as well as many etiquettes in conversation. With practice students should also feel more confident in expressing their ideas about many topics.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for students taking minor within this department ◎Exclusive for freshman
